content.text:
Katja
14.8.23:
was my lucky day this year!
Because you appeared in my life and made me the most happy girl!
I didn’t know yet what kind of amazing person you are.
And now you make me feel so special every day 🥺 
14.8.23:
the most beautiful person on this planet decided to write me.
I will always celebrate this day.
14.8.23:
Is the day where our love journey began 
14.8.♾️:
it will never end!♥️

John
14.8.23:
Is the day my wandering soul find its destination
14.8.23:
Is where the parallel universes converges, because I cannot imagine one without me meeting you!
14.8.♾️:
I will always love you!

《凯佳美德》
凯月千里伴子期
佳人海内存知己
美丽动人花解意
德馨如兰春化雨

"Virtuous Katja"
The moon shines on my friend so far, so dear,
Casting my wishes, making the distance clear.
Lovely as blossoms, with thoughts so refined,
Virtuous as orchids, with spring's gentle rain combined.

John
高山流水遇知音 ，人生得一知己足矣。
meeting someone that understands my music and mind,
my life is complete

Katja
幸福是唯一的东西，当你分享它时，他就会翻倍。
Happiness is the only thing that, when you share it, it multiplies.

Katja
I learned this word today: 蜂蜜. And it remembers me at you!
You’re like honey for me 😊 for my soul and my mood 😍

John
I learnt the German word too Süßigkeit ❤
Everytime I see your message my heart would literally be melted by your sweetness 😍

《凯佳辰喜，当明心许》
凯月似水 佳期如梦
辰星雨过 喜盼讯音
当喻伊人 明珠碧玉
心有灵犀 许愿终生

"Happy birthday Katja, my heart is yours"
Moonlight shines so clear,
Moments like dreams draw near,
After rain, stars appear,
Awaiting a friend's words, I hold dear.
Her grace, like jewels so rare,
A bond with her, beyond compare,
Quietly, a wish in the air,
For her happiness, a lifetime's prayer.

《七夕，星空下的约定》
繁星闪烁，回忆起古老传说。
牛郎织女，谱写着永恒诗歌。
知己难寻，相遇在偶然时刻。
浩瀚银河，见证那永恒你我。
琴声悠扬，星空下演奏乐曲。
余音绕梁，旋律中最美是你。
红袖添香，故事里我愿羁旅。
荡气回肠，天地间永为伴侣。
千山万水，怎抵挡衷心情意。
时空相隔，难动摇我心已许。
佳节七夕，赤子心跨越万里。
美梦成真，终相会牛郎织女！

"A Promise Under the Starry Sky"
Stars above twinkle and glow, recalling tales from long ago.
NiuLang and ZhiNü, their eternal song we know.
Souls mates are rare, found in a moment's spree,
The vast Milky Way, witnesses our eternity.
Piano notes rise high, under stars they serenely fly.
Echoes dance around, in the melody, you're the most profound.
Red sleeves scent the tale, with you, I'd journey without fail.
Stirring deep emotion, through time and space, an endless devotion.
Through mountains vast and rivers wide, true feelings can't be denied.
Time and space may part, but vows of my heart never depart.
On this Qixi fest, with an earnest heart, I travel the quest.
Dreams do come through, as NiuLang and ZhiNü finally rendezvous!

Sweet surrender of finding
One’s tired soul unwinding
Until life no longer matters;
Love unchains all its fetters.
Mirrored half of each other’s mess,
Aspiring always for nothing less
Than to love across life’s pages,
Either together or apart for ages.

Katja, wrap me up in all your
I want you in my arms
Oh, let me hold you
I'll never let you go again like I did
Oh, I used to say
I would never fall in love again until I found her
I said, "I would never fall unless it's you I fall into"
I was lost within the darkness, but then I found her
I found you

难以忘记初次见你
It is hard to forget my first encounter of you
一双迷人的眼睛
A pair of charming eyes
在我脑海里 你的身影 挥散不去
In my mind, the memory of your figure is unwavering
握你的双手感觉你的温柔
Holding your hands, feeling your gentleness
真的有点透不过气
There's a slight sense of breathlessness
你的天真 我想珍惜
I want to cherish your innocence
看到你受委屈 我会伤心
Seeing you aggrieved, I will feel sad
只怕我自己会爱上你
I'm afraid that I will fall in love with you
不敢让自己靠得太近
I don't have the courage of being too close to you
怕我没什么能够给你
I'm afraid that I don't have much to give you
爱你也需要很大的勇气
Perhaps loving you requires great courage
只怕我自己会爱上你
I am afraid that I will fall in love with you
也许有天会情不自禁
Perhaps one day, I will be unable to refrain
想念只让自己苦了自己
Yearning (for you) only makes me suffer
爱上你是我情非得已
Loving you is my last resort

When I'm in Berlin you're off to London
When I'm in New York you're doing Rome
All those crazy nights we spend together
As voices on the phone
Wishing we could be more telepathic
Tired of the nights I sleep alone
Wishing we could redirect the traffic
And we find ourselves a home
Can you feel the raindrops in the desert
Have you seen the sunrays in the dark
Do you feel my love when I'm not present
Standing by your side while miles apart
Sunshine in the rain
Love is still the same
Sunshine in the rain
Sunshine in the rain
Love is still the same
Sunshine in the rain

Hiding from the rain and snow
Trying to forget, but I won't let go
Looking at a crowded street
Listening to my own heartbeat
So many people all around the world
Tell me, where do I find someone like you, girl?
Take me to your heart, take me to your soul
Give me your hand before I'm old
Show me what love is, haven't got a clue
Show me that wonders can be true
They say nothing lasts forever
We're only here today
Love is now or never
Bring me far away
Take me to your heart, take me to your soul
Give me your hand and hold me
Show me what love is, be my guiding star
It's easy, take me to your heart

I'll be your dream, I'll be your wish, I'll be your fantasy
I'll be your hope, I'll be your love, be everything that you need
I love you more with every breath truly, madly, deeply do
I will be strong, I will be faithful 'cause I'm counting on
A new beginnin'
A reason for livin'
A deeper meaning, yeah

I wanna stand with you on a mountain
I wanna bathe with you in the sea
I wanna lay like this forever
Until the sky falls down on me

Oh, can you see it, baby?
You don't have to close your eyes
It's standin' right before you
All that you need will surely come

Wise men say
"Only fools rush in"
But I can't help falling in love with you
Shall I stay, would it be a sin?
If I can't help falling in love with you

Shall I stay, would it be a sin?
If I can't help falling in love with you

Take my hand, take my whole life too
'Cause I can't help falling in love with you

You are my sunshine
My only sunshine
You make me happy
When skies are gray
You'll never know, dear
How much I love you
Please don't take
My sunshine away
The other night, dear
As I lay sleeping
I dreamed I held you
In my arms
When I awoke, dear
I was mistaken
So I hung my head and I cried
You are my sunshine
My only sunshine
You make me happy
When skies are gray
You'll never know, dear
How much I love you
Please don't take
My sunshine away

忘了有多久，再没听到你
对我说你最爱的故事
我想了很久，我开始慌了
是不是我又做错了什么
你哭着对我说，童话里都是骗人的
我不可能是你的王子
也许你不会懂，从你说爱我以后
我的天空星星都亮了
我愿变成童话里，你爱的那个天使
张开双手，变成翅膀守护你
你要相信，相信我们会像童话故事里
幸福和快乐是结局

It’s been a long time, since you last told me
your favorite fairy-tale story
I thought a long time, Something was not right
Could it be that I had done something wrong?
Crying you said to me, that fairy tales never come true
There is no way that I’d be your prince
But you don’t understand, After you said “I love you”
Stars in my sky have shined ever since
Can I become, be the one, be that angel you dream of
Reach out my hands, And embrace you with my wings
You must believe, we can live out our own perfect fantasy
happy endings for you and me

Another day has gone, I'm still all alone
How could this be? You're not here with me

Every day, I sit and ask myself, "How did love slip away?"
Something whispers in my ear and says

That you are not alone, I am here with you
Though you're far away, I am here to stay
But you are not alone, I am here with you
Though we're far apart, you're always in my heart
But you are not alone

"Seligkeit"
Es ist ein Glück zu wissen,
daß du bist,
Von dir zu träumen
hohe Wonne ist,
Nach dir sich sehnen
macht zum Traum die Zeit,
Bei dir zu sein,
ist ganze Seligkeit.

Baby 为了这次约会，昨夜我无法安然入睡
Baby, for this date, Last night, I couldn't sleep
准备了 十二朵玫瑰
Prepared twelve roses,
每一朵都像你那样美
Each one as beautiful as you,
你的美无声无息
Your beauty, a whisper, silent and rare,
不知不觉让我追随
Unknowingly, made me follow,
Baby 这次动了情
Baby, this time I've fallen in love,
彷徨失措我不后悔
In my heart, I cherish, without a single care.
你在我眼中是最美
In my eyes, you are the most beautiful,
每一个微笑都让我沉醉
Every smile you bestow, brings pure delight,
你的怀 你的好
Your embrace, your kindness, day or night,
你发脾气时翘起的嘴
Even when you pout, it feels just right.
你在我心中是最美
In my heart, you are the most beautiful,
只有相爱的人最能体会
Only those in love can truly understand,
你明了 我明了 这种美妙的滋味.
You understand, and I understand, This wonderful feeling

When I am down and, oh my soul, so weary
When troubles come and my heart burdened be
Then, I am still and wait here in the silence
Until You come and sit awhile with me.
You raise me up, so I can stand on mountains
You raise me up, to walk on stormy seas
I am strong, when I am on your shoulders
You raise me up to more than I can be

An empty street, an empty house
A hole inside my heart
I'm all alone, the rooms are getting smaller
I wonder how, I wonder why
I wonder where they are
The days we had, the songs we sang together
Oh, yeah
And oh, my love
I'm holding on forever
Reaching for the love that seems so far
So, I say a little prayer
And hope my dreams will take me there
Where the skies are blue
To see you once again, my love
Overseas, from coast to coast
To find a place I love the most
Where the fields are green
To see you once again
My love

La Le Lu
Nur der Mann im Mond schaut zu
Wenn die kleinen Babys schlafen
Drum schlaf auch du
 
La Le Lu
Vor dem Bettchen steh'n zwei Schuh'
Und die sind genauso müde
Geh'n jetzt zur Ruh'
 
Dann kommt auch der Sandmann
Leis' tritt er ins Haus
Sucht aus seinen Träumen
Für dich den Schönsten aus
 
La Le Lu
Nur der Mann im Mond schaut zu
Wenn die kleinen Babys schlafen
Drum schlaf auch du

《誓言》
携子之手，与子偕老。
永结同心，百年合好。
非卿不娶，视如珍宝。
海枯石烂，天荒地老！

"The Vow"
Give me your hand my love,
I'll show you forever.
Bonded my soul with you,
our hearts belong together!
I can love nobody else but you,
I see you as the most beautiful treasure.
For better, for worse,
to love and to cherish, from this day forward!

Katja
Mon amour je t'amie

John
Ich liebe dich, mein Schatz

Katja
Ich liebe dich auch

Katja
Te amo

John
我爱你

John
I love you so much
愛している Ai shite iru

《凯佳最美》
凯云清风 佳偶天成
醉卧花丛 美不自胜

"Katja is the most beautiful"
Amidst the clouds so fair,
a perfect pair we share.
In fragrant blooms we lay,
lost in beauty's sway.

人生路上甜苦和喜忧愿与你分担所有
On the journey of life, through its sweetness and bitterness, joys and sorrows,
I wish to share everything with you.
难免曾经跌倒和等候要勇敢的抬头
It's inevitable to stumble and wait, but we must bravely lift our heads.
谁愿藏躲在避风的港口宁有波涛汹涌的自由
Who would rather hide in a sheltered harbor when there's the freedom of surging waves?
愿是你心中灯塔的守候在迷雾中让你看透
May I be the lighthouse in your heart, waiting for you to see through the fog.
阳光总在风雨后乌云上有晴空
The sunlight always emerges after the rain, and there's clear sky above the dark clouds.
珍惜所有的感动每一份希望在你手中
Cherish all the emotions, every bit of hope is in your hands.
阳光总在风雨后请相信有彩虹
The sunlight always emerges after the rain; please believe in the rainbow.
风风雨雨都接受我一直会在妳的左右
Through all the ups and downs, happily accept everything; I will always be by your side.

《一生有你，愿许终身》
一眼万年逢知己，生而为卿喜相遇。
有崖天地无尽情，你我今生天注定。
愿有岁月可回首，许卿终身共白头。
终有鹊桥七夕会，身如彩凤比翼飞。

"With you in my life, I vow to spend a lifetime"
In one glance, a bond for eternity found,
Destined to find you, the happiness profound.
The world has its limits, yet our love unbound.
Universe brought you, it's fate, so astounded.
May the years we look back with glee,
Promise to be with you for eternity.
At the rainbow's end we will meet,
Like colorful phoenixes, our hearts will beat in harmony, our fate complete.

Dreamin', I must be dreamin'
Or am I really lying here with you?
Baby, you take me in your arms
And though I'm wide awake, I know my dream is comin' true
And oh I just fall in love again
Just one touch and then it happens every time
There I go by, just fall in love again and when I do
I can't help myself, I fall in love with you
Magic, it must be magic
The way I hold you when the night just seems to fly
Easy for you to take me to a star
Heaven is that moment when I look into your eyes.
And oh I just fall in love again
Just one touch and then it happens every time
There I go by, just fall in love again and when I do
I can't help myself, I fall in love with you

《终生为你》
既许一人以偏爱，
愿尽余生之慷慨。
只缘感卿一回顾，
使我思君朝与暮。

"To dedicate you my lifetime"
Vowed to forever be your side.
Repay your generosity with my life.
With just one glance, your presence such delight.
Thoughts of you, every heart beat, day and night.

只是因为在人群中多看了你一眼
Just because I happened to glance at you in the crowd
再也没能忘掉你的容颜
I couldn't forget your face anymore
梦想着偶然能有一天再相见
Dreaming that one day we might meet again by chance
从此我开始孤单地思念
Since then, I've been lonely, missing you
想你时你在天边
When I think of you, you're in the sky
想你时你在眼前
When I think of you, you're right before my eyes
想你时你在脑海
When I think of you, you're in my mind
想你时你在心田
When I think of you, you're in my heart
宁愿相信我们前世有约
I'd rather believe that we had a predestined connection in a past life
今生的爱情故事不会再改变
The love story of this lifetime won't change anymore
宁愿用这一生等你发现
I'd rather spend this lifetime waiting for you to realize
我一直在你身旁
I've always been by your side
从未走远
Never gone far away

《老婆幸苦老公爱你》
老天不负苦心人，婆娑树晚秋风临。
辛有佳人心相印，苦尽甘来盼星辰。
老骥伏枥赤子心，公无不克可铄金。
爱卿胜己付终身，你我情深泣鬼神!

"Wife you've worked hard, hubby loves you"
The heavens favor those who works hard,
Like autumn trees, dancing in the chilly dark.
Lucky to have you dear, you warm up my heart,
I pray in dreams, a life together we will start.
Time marches on, but my heart's still young,
My passion, a fire, can melt anything strong.
You mean more to me than words ever sung,
Moving god to tears, our love so profound!

《剪烛西窗》
但求此生同行路，何当共剪西窗烛？
夜夜流光思君处，愿有伊人伴旅途。
功名利禄身外物，荣华富贵微尘土。
唯有携子同甘苦，方是世间真幸福。

"I miss you"
In this life, I hope we share the road,
When will we meet and share the same candle's glow?
Night after night, I think of you afar,
Wish to have you by my side, a guiding star.
Wealth and fame, mere worldly matter,
Glory and riches, in the end, scatter.
Being with you, in hardships and cheer,
is the only true happiness in this world, my dear.

用我的晚安陪你吃早餐
Using my goodnight to accompany your breakfast,
记得把想念存进扑满
Remember to store your longing for me in a jar full.
我望着满天星在闪
I gaze at the stars twinkling in the sky,
听牛郎对织女说要勇敢
Listening to the NiuLang telling ZhiNü to be brave.
别怕我们在地球的两端
It's okay we're at opposite ends of the Earth.
看我的问候骑着魔毯
I'll be riding on a magic carpet to see you.
飞 用光速飞到你面前
Flying, flying at the speed of light to be by your side,
让你能看到十字星有北极星作伴
So you can see the Big Dipper Star with the North Star as its companion.
少了我的手背当枕头你习不习惯
Do you get used to not having my arm as a pillow?
你的望远镜望不到我北半球的孤单
Your telescope can't see my loneliness in the other hemisphere.
太平洋的潮水跟着地球来回旋转
The Pacific tides follow the Earth's rotation,
我会耐心的等 随时欢迎你靠岸
I'll patiently wait, always welcoming you to shore.
少了我的怀抱当暖炉你习不习惯
Do you get used to not having my embrace as a warm hearth?
E给你照片看不到我北半球的孤单
Even with photos, you can't see the loneliness in my hemisphere.
世界再大两颗真心就能互相取暖
No matter how big the world is, two sincere hearts can warm each other.
想念不会偷懒 我的梦统统给你保管
Longing won't be lazy; I'll keep all my dreams for you.

Heimkehr
Nur noch ein paar Stunden, dann endet diese Reise.
Bin in Gedanken versunken, und um mich wird es leise.

Wir sind seit Wochen getrennt, gefühlt wie eine Ewigkeit,
seit dem Abschiedsmoment, verging so unendlich viel Zeit.

Gabst mir dein Herz ins Gepäck, sollte Begleiter mir sein.
und bin ich doch ganz weit weg, so war ich niemals allein.

Doch in so manch tiefer Nacht, hat mich die Sehnsucht gequält.
Bin dann oft aufgewacht, hast mir unendlich gefehlt.

Unsere Liebe ist stark, die uns stets fest verbindet.
Sie half uns jeden Tag, die Zeit zu überwinden.

Endlich seh‘n wir uns heute, bin auf dem Heimweg zu Dir
und mein Herz bebt vor Freude, diese Ungeduld in mir.

Dich zärtlich zu berühren, in deine Augen zu schauen,
all deine Liebe zu spüren, diesmal ist es kein Traum.

Habe Tränen in den Augen, ein Glücksgefühl in mir
und ich kann kaum glauben, Ich bin bald wieder bei Dir.

《有你是家，彼岸开花》
有情之人成眷属，你我一生共甘苦。
是心似海同旅途，家为有你便幸福。
彼此情深比金固，岸远崖高可征服。
开花结果同船渡，花落花开归根处。

"With you is home, where the flowers bloom"
In love, we find family, hearts intertwined,
You and I, for better or worse, life's joys we'll find.
With dreams in our hearts, the world we shall explore,
Home is where you are, forevermore.
Our love, like strong gold, unwavering and bold,
Distant shores and steep cliffs, together we'll hold.
As our love bears fruit, we unite as man and wife,
Through the thick and thins, you're my journey for life.

Wilhelm, was ist unserem Herzen die Welt ohne Liebe!
Was eine Zauberlaterne ist ohne Licht!
Kaum bringst du das Lämpchen hinein, so scheinen dir die buntesten Bilder an deine weiße Wand!
Und wenn's nichts wäre als das, als vorübergehende Phantome, so macht's doch immer unser Glück,
wenn wir wie frische Jungen davor stehen und uns über die Wundererscheinungen entzücken.
—— Die Leiden des jungen Werther

《云霄情思》
云中谁寄锦书来
霄汉九天上蓬莱
情钟佳偶天仙子
思卿日切斥心怀

"Love song from the clouds"
In the clouds, who sent a silk letter here,
Above the celestial realms, Penglai does appear.
Love's sweet chime, celestial maiden by my side,
Longing for you daily, my heart can't hide.

《古城念卿》
古色平遥客纷纷
城旧人殊唯情真
念念不忘远方人
卿何共赏北国春

"missing you from ancient pinyao"
In ancient Pingyao, travelers come and go,
In this old city, people change,
only true feelings grow.
Yearning never fade, thinking of distant you.
How I wish to travel the country with you, together our hands hold.

《归途寄凯佳》
飞天逐日，时光匆匆。目之所及，皆卿音容。
古城雀楼，宝殿圣宫。心中唯念，与你相逢。
红霞尽染，怜君燃情。恨无双翅，穿云破空。
至汝旁侧，夜寐夙兴。鞠躬尽瘁，亲爱精诚。
弱水三千，从一而终。心永许你，海誓山盟。
比翼双飞，身如彩凤。同游四海，携手终生。

"Homeward Song for Katja"
Chasing the sun on a plane, but time won't be outrun,
Every sight reminds me of your smile and the warmth of your sun.
From ancient Pingyao's streets to temples so grand,
My thoughts always revolved around holding your hand.
The red sunset's glow ignites my burning desire,
Wishing for wings to fly to you, set my heart on fire.
Early mornings, late nights, in your love, I confide,
To cherish you eternally, with you, I'll abide.
In this vast world, you're the only one I hold dear,
My heart's devoted to you, the god will hear.
Our souls intertwined, like phoenixes we glide,
Hand in hand, we'll explore life's endless tide.
With you as my star, I live in your warm grace,
Explore the world togethet, we'll be in each other's brace.
Together we'll venture, through joy and through strife,
Forever and always, you're the love of my life.

I don't know, but I believe
That some things are meant to be
And that you'll make a better me
Everyday I love you
I never thought that dreams came true
But you showed me that they do
You know that I learn something new
Everyday I love you
'Cause I believe that destiny
Is out of our control
And you'll never live until you love
With all your heart and soul

'Cause I believe that destiny
Is out of our control
And you'll never live until you love
With all your heart and soul
If I asked would you say yes?
Together we're the very best
I know that I am truly blessed
Everyday I love you
And I'll give you my best
Everyday I love you

There's a calm surrender
To the rush of day
When the heat of a rolling wind
Can be turned away
An enchanted moment
And it sees me through
It's enough for this restless warrior
Just to be with you

And can you feel the love tonight?
It is where we are
It's enough for this wide-eyed wanderer
That we got this far
And can you feel the love tonight
How it's laid to rest?
It's enough to make kings and vagabonds

Believe the very best

It's beautiful life
Forever I'll stay by your side
It's beautiful life
Always standing right behind you
Beautiful love
Cause we're standing under the same sky Even though we are world's apart
Beautiful life
Beautiful day
Though I am only living in memories
Beautiful life
Beautiful day
Won't you let me inside your heart
Beautiful my love
Beautiful your heart
It's beautiful life
It's beautiful life

《明月相思，秋夜恋曲》
明星闪烁晨熹微
月皎云淡影伴归
相见何时佳期至
思绪万里任飘飞
秋初风清愁消退
夜阑人静吾心醉
恋君情真祈安康
曲歌一首遥相慰

"Yearning under the moon so bright,
a love song on an autumn night."
Brightest star still shining under morning's first light,
On my journey homeward, moon and shadow unite.
When will I be in your embrace, the moment so right?
My longing travels far, ten thousand miles in its flight.

Early autumn's breeze, sweeps my sorrow from sight,
Late at night, in silence, my yearning's burning bright.
My love for you, so true, I pray every night,
I sing a love song, your dreams it'll ignite.

Oceans apart, day after day
And I slowly go insane
I hear your voice on the line
But it doesn't stop the pain
If I see you next to never
How can we say forever?
Wherever you go, whatever you do
I will be right here waiting for you
Whatever it takes or how my heart breaks
I will be right here waiting for you
I took for granted all the times
That I thought would last somehow
I hear the laughter, I taste the tears
But I can't get near you now
Oh, can't you see it, baby?
You've got me goin' crazy
Wherever you go, whatever you do
I will be right here waiting for you
Whatever it takes or how my heart breaks
I will be right here waiting for you

明月几时有？把酒问青天。
不知天上宫阙，今夕是何年。
我欲乘风归去，又恐琼楼玉宇，高处不胜寒。
起舞弄清影，何似在人间。
转朱阁，低绮户，照无眠。
不应有恨，何事长向别时圆？
人有悲欢离合，月有阴晴圆缺，此事古难全。
但愿人长久，千里共婵娟。

How long will the full moon appear?
Wine cup in hand, I ask the sky.
I do not know what time of the year
’Twould be tonight in the palace on high.
Riding the wind, there I would fly,
Yet I’m afraid the crystalline palace would be
Too high and cold for me.
I rise and dance, with my shadow I play.
On high as on earth, would it be as gay?

The moon goes round the mansions red
Through gauze-draped window soft to shed
Her light upon the sleepless bed.
Why then when people part, is the oft full and bright?
Men have sorrow and joy; they part or meet again;
The moon is bright or dim and she may wax or wane.
There has been nothing perfect since the olden days.
So let us wish that man
Will live long as he can!
Though miles apart, we’ll share the beauty she displays.

《梦盼佳期，花好月圆》
梦游蓬莱九重天
盼至鹊桥会天仙
佳偶知音人神羡
期遇万里魂梦牵
花赠伊人心不变
好梦当惜吾情专
月光似水爱无限
圆缺阴晴共婵娟

"In Dream's Embrace, We'll Unite as One"
In dreams, I soared to heavens high above,
Just to meet with you, on the magpie bridge of love.
Our souls connected so tight, how the gods will envy.
Pulling my heart from miles apart, your heavenly beauty!

Fragrant flowers to you, I pledge my unwavering faith,
Like a dream come true, a lifetime I dedicate to this fate.
My love so profound under the silver moonlight's sway.
In good or bad, forever by your side I'll stay.

Look into my eyes, you will see
What you mean to me
Search your heart, search your soul
And when you find me there you'll search no more

Don't tell me it's not worth tryin' for
You can't tell me it's not worth dyin' for
You know it's true
Everything I do, I do it for you

Look into your heart, you will find
There's nothin' there to hide
Take me as I am, take my life
I would give it all, I would sacrifice

Don't tell me it's not worth fightin' for
I can't help it, there's nothin' I want more
You know it's true
Everything I do, I do it for you

《咏凯佳》
亭亭玉立，如花似玉
月貌花容，天生质丽
白璧无瑕，玉骨冰肌
清新脱俗，窈窕淑女

"Ode to Katja"
Graceful and poised, like a flower so fair,
Moonlit beauty, beyond compare.
Refreshing and pure, skin smooth as air.
Pure as white jade, with elegance so rare,

From my youngest years
Till this moment here
I've never seen
Such a lovely queen
From the skies above
To the deepest love
I've never felt
Crazy like this before
Paint my love
You should paint my love
It's the picture of a thousand sunsets
It's the freedom of a thousand doves
Baby, you should paint my love
Been around the world
Then I met you, girl
It's like coming home
To a place I've known
Paint my love
You should paint my love
It's the picture of a thousand sunsets
It's the freedom of a thousand doves
Baby, you should paint my love

《梦中情人》
梦会吾爱难舍分，
中有真意享天伦。
情意缱绻深依偎，
人得佳偶不虚寻。

"dream lover"
In dreams, I met my love,
we're hard to part,
True meaning in life,
as one family we start.
Our love, unending,
in each other's embrace,
Finding my soul mate,
life's worth, a sweet chase.

It's been so long since we took the time
To share words from deep inside us
We're in our own world, spinning our Wheels
But you know how I feel
Since the first time I took your hand
My love for you has just been growing
You always seem to understand
You know how I am
I'm gonna love you till the end
I'm gonna be your very true friend
I wanna share your ups and downs
I'm gonna be around

Es ist Nacht,
und mein Herz kommt zu dir,
hält's nicht aus,
hält's nicht aus mehr bei mir.
Legt sich dir auf die Brust,
wie ein Stein,
sinkt hinein,
zu dem deinen hinein.
Dort erst,
dort erst kommt es zur Ruh,
liegt auf dem Grund
seines ewigen Du.

《余生温柔》
只为感君长相守，当许余生以温柔
浮世三千皆过客，唯有吾爱在心头
相思难表诗千首，愿有岁月可回眸
山河远阔星河灿，只愿与你共遨游

"The gentleness of the rest of my life is all for you."
In love I'll stay, forever by your side,
Promise you all, the gentleness of my life.
In this world countless souls pass by,
Only you my love, in my heart forever reside.

A thousand poems, my affection never die,
May our wish come true, our love blossom in time.
Vast as mountains, bright as stars in the sky,
I only wish to explore with you, day and night.

It’s a beautiful feeling
What we got deep inside
We got a flame that will last forever
Together you and I

Such a rush of emotions
There’s no way we can push it away
Cuz they’ll never tear our love apart
Our bond will never break

Do you believe in the power
Of everlasting love
We can make it if we stay together
Our love is just enough

Promise me this forever
We’ll always stay this way
We can start at the end of time
And do it all again

Oh my love, I’m all yours
And there will never be another one
‘cause I’m eternally yours
My heart’s a flame
And it’s burning in your name
Even through the sands of time
My love will always grow
And I won’t let go
